headline: Last Barclays Women’s Super League games for five weeks

headline: Man City Women’s UWCL victory marred by Greenwood injury
summary: Manchester City extended their perfect record in the UEFA Women’s Champions League group stage to a fifth matchday, while Arsenal made it four wins in five. Group C: Bayern Munich 4-0 Juventus, Vålerenga 1-3 Arsenal […]

headline: Six-goal Chelsea Women record fifth straight UWCL win
summary: Chelsea and Lyon both continued their perfect form in the UEFA Women’s Champions League group stage while Wolfsburg secured their quarter-final place. Group A: Galatasaray 0-6 Lyon, Wolfsburg 6-1 Roma Wolfsburg hit Roma 6-1 to […]

headline: Man Utd eventually see off Newcastle 5-3 in Women’s League Cup
summary: Brighton, Durham, Manchester United, Spurs and West Ham progress to the Women’s League Cup last eight, joining Arsenal, Chelsea and Man City. GROUP A: Liverpool 4-0 Everton, Manchester United 5-3 Newcastle United Hannah Greenwood conceded an […]

headline: UWCL and Women’s League Cup midweek matches
summary: The penultimate round of UWCL group stages games are being played this midweek, as are the last matches in the Women’s League Cup sections. Chelsea chase a fifth straight win in the Champions League when […]

headline: Five Lionesses make the 2024 FIFPRO Women’s World 11
summary: Five England internationals made the 2024 FIFPRO Women’s World 11 which was voted for by a record-breaking 7,000 female players. Lucy Bronze equals the current Women’s World II appearance record of seven, which she shares […]

headline: Chelsea edge Barclays Women’s Super League thriller with Brighton
summary: Chelsea kept up their perfect record in the Barclays Women’s Super League this season but were given more than a couple of scares by Brighton. Manchester United 4-0 Liverpool Manchester City 4-0 Leicester City Tottenham […]

headline: North West derby kicks off Barclays Women’s Super League return

headline: 2024 Barclays WSL Hall of Fame inductees unveiled
summary: Alex Scott, Gilly Flaherty, Steph Houghton and referee Rebecca Welch are this year’s inductees to the Barclays WSL Hall of Fame. Alex Scott MBE won 21 trophies with Arsenal, was capped 140 times by England […]

headline: Shortlist revealed for 2024 FIFPRO Women’s World 11
summary: The FIFPRO Women’s World 11 finalists are the 26 players who received the most votes from their peers for their performances from 21 August 2023 to 10 August 2024. A record-breaking number of professional footballers […]
